entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 07:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
